skillTree.localised_description: The chosen of the Blood God leave burning cities in their wake, exerting Khorne's savage dominion over the mortal plane.
This Lord speaks with a dread booming voice - a gift from his Dark Masters to ensure obedience.
The followers of Chaos need not to rest, they march on with iron hearts desperate to harvest souls.
The shadow of the Ruinous Powers looms large, protecting those who bear their mark.
Having learned much in their long years of service, this character now turns their attention to training others.

effects.description: Character will share +15% of experience earned between all other active Lords

skillTree.localised_description: Only the worthiest achieve glory in Valkia’s presence, knowing that Khorne watches her closely and despises cowards.

effects.description:
Recruit rank: +1 for Chaos Marauders units
	(all armies)

skillTree.localised_description: The legend of Valkia’s ill-fated tribe is known throughout the north, a vestige of her lost humanity eradicated in bloody vengeance.

effects.description: Allegiance points gained: +25% for alliances and vassalage with Norsca

Attribute: Vanguard Deployment for Chaos Marauders, Chaos Warriors and Chosen
	(Lord's army)

This unit can deploy outside the deployment zone.

skillTree.localised_description: The repair of Valkia’s mortal frame was but a prelude to Khorne’s gift of godly vitality.
While the craven sneak to their death, the brave live on.
Nothing drains the enemy’s fight like ritualistic executions of severed ribs and exposed lungs strewn across bloody backs.

effects.description:
Enemy leadership: -5
	(enemy armies in local province)

skillTree.localised_description: By the indomitable will of the God of Warriors, His chosen queen will not be allowed to die.

related_attributes.bullet_text:
Daemonic units cannot be routed, but take damage when their Leadership is low.
	
	Daemonic units also have:
	Physical Resistance
	 Fear and Terror Immunity

skillTree.localised_description: The Warriors of Chaos are the playthings of Gods and given many gifts, including formidable fighting skills.
Some creatures charge home with such fury that the very ground shakes beneath their feet.
Creatures with tough hides or some kind of natural armour are tough nuts to crack - even a powerful attack may fall foul of their thick-skin.
Hand-to-hand combat is a lethal match of cut and thrust. However, it’s not all about offensive strikes; parries and other defensive moves can also win the day.
A deadly blade is especially lethal when in the hands of this master death-maker, killer and slaughterer!
From one bloodied, lifeless corpse to the next, this one is always looking for the next adversary to best.
Such is their power and ferocity, a wound-maker will ravage the foe, cutting and pulverising until there is only one exit - death.
The scars on this storied warrior reveal a veteran of many battles, a being not easy to kill and one worthy of respect and fear.
The iron will and indomitable presence of this leader ensures their followers remain steadfast when facing peril.
A blade that sings in defence will not let its wielder be penetrated.
The bigger they are, the harder they fall.

attributes.bullet_text: The unit is immune to psychological attacks (Fear & Terror).

skillTree.localised_description: A Chaos Lord dominates – lesser beings cringe from a being that is so intently under scrutiny from the Dark Gods.

effects.description:

skillTree.localised_description: To the Northmen, there is no greater honour than to fight and perish under the gaze of the Gods.

skillTree.localised_description: There is no other choice. There never was.
Those who know the land and its secrets will travel faster and further than the foes who don't.
To despoil, to corrupt and ruin, to break the mortals and take their gods from them - this is what Chaos wants.
"You will serve me, wretch, or you will die, there is no other option."

Unit Upgrades cost: -10% for all units

skillTree.localised_description: No act of faith can rival reaving the souls of the slain; a dark and twisted offering in honour of the Ruinous Powers.

skillTree.localised_description: The fire of hate burns rapidly across the land, turning all in its path to ash and cinder.

attributes.bullet_text: This unit frightens all enemy units, reducing their leadership when nearby. It is also immune to fear. Fear penalties do not stack.
This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.

A unit with the Mark of Khorne has:
	➕ Frenzy Passive Ability
	➕ Increased  Spell Resistance
	➕ Increased  Armour
	➖ Reduced  Melee Defence

enabled_if: Leadership is higher than 50% of base

attributes.bullet_text: The unit is immune to psychological attacks (Fear & Terror).

factionEffects.localised_description: All warriors who fight before His Gorequeen slaughter zealously for His attention, knowing that becoming Khorne’s chosen is a prize beyond measure.

effects.description: Maximum active gifts: +1 for Gifts of Khorne

Campaign movement range: +15% after winning a battle
	(all characters)
Vassals gain "Frenzy" and spread Khorne corruption

items.colour_text: This suit of armour runs red with thick strings of blood, sapping the strength of all Khorne’s enemies.

ui_effects.localised_text: Effect intensity increases with each kill made by the unit.

item_set.name: The Fellsteel of Gore
item_set.description: Just like her own diabolic form, the Gorequeen’s assemblage of armaments were reforged in Khorne’s realm.

items.colour_text: Ever since the Daemon Prince Locephax angered the Gorequeen, his horned head and hypnotic eyes have adorned her shield.

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Born a warrior, lived as a queen, and died as a legend, Valkia now spills blood without need of sleep, respite or sustenance.
